home.make-colouring-books-from-your-own-stori: Make colouring books from your own stories

feature-1.title: Smart Story Memory
feature-1.description: Our magical AI remembers every part of your story! From the friends you meet to the treasures you find, each new page keeps it all just right, so your adventure always makes sense!

feature-2.title: Your Story, Your Adventure
feature-2.description: Go anywhere, do anything! Take your character from climbing mountains to flying jets to walking on the moon. Every choice makes a brand-new journey only you can create!

feature-3.title: Custom Coloring Characters
feature-3.description: Create any character you can imagine! How about a teddy bear with a superhero cape, an athletic slice of pizza with strong arms, or a smart shark that teaches math? Bring your wildest ideas to life!

feature-4.title: Magic Redraws
feature-4.description: Change up the story with just a few words! Add a hero’s hat, a magical sword, or anything else you imagine. Watch the page transform to match your ideas!

feature-5.title: Quick, Easy & Saved Forever
feature-5.description: Make your own coloring book in minutes! Save your favorites, download them as PDFs, or share them anytime. Your adventures are always saved to your profile!

success.your-book-has-been-successfully-generate: Your book has been successfully generated!
